nodes.text: The Spiteful was a bulk freighter owned by Nebula Consumables and piloted by Captain Seprine.

Under the command of Captain Seprine and her crew, the Spiteful made runs to exclusive markets in the Mid Rim and the Expansion Region, carrying mundane and luxury food items as well as more expensive cargoes. During the course of her captaincy, Seprine had romantic relationships with every male member of the Spiteful's crew, and manipulated each of her lovers until they obeyed and feared her.
